title: Implement multi-factor authentication
description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure a higher level of security for my account.
attributes_and_rules: Must support SMS and email OTPs; fallback to email verification if SMS fails
acceptance_criteria:
1. User can enable multi-factor authentication.
2. User receives OTP via selected method.
test_cases: Given a user with multi-factor authentication enabled, When they log in, Then they should receive an OTP.

title: Handle secure session management
description: As a customer, I want my session to be managed securely, so that I can be assured of secure transactions.
attributes_and_rules: Session timeout after 15 minutes of inactivity; notify user upon logout.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User session expires after inactivity.
2. User is notified upon automatic logout.
test_cases: Given a user logged in, When 15 minutes of inactivity occur, Then the user should be logged out.

title: Create user profile management
description: As an admin, I want to manage user profiles and roles, so that I can control access levels and permissions within the platform.
attributes_and_rules: Must store user info, roles; allow linking of multiple accounts.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Admin can create/update user profiles.
2. Admin can assign roles to users.
test_cases: Given an admin user, When they create a profile, Then the user should be added with the specified roles.

title: Design a responsive interface
description: As a customer, I want a seamless experience across devices, so that I can manage my banking needs conveniently.
attributes_and_rules: Support for desktop, tablets, and mobile; adherence to branding guidelines.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Interface adapts to different devices.
2. Consistent branding across all devices.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they access the portal from different devices, Then the UI should adapt and function properly.

title: Develop a customizable dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant banking products and services tailored to my profile.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time data sync; display user-specific products and services.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User sees tailored information on dashboard.
2. Dashboard updates in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they log in, Then the dashboard should display personalized information.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Automate account opening workflows
description: As a customer, I want to open a new account via a streamlined process, so that I can quickly and easily use the bank's services.
attributes_and_rules: Minimize steps; real-time data validation; compliance with regulations.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User completes account opening with minimal steps.
2. System validates data in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they use the account opening workflow, Then the process should validate data and minimize steps.

title: Enable real-time request tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my requests in real time, so that I can stay informed about their status.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User sees real-time status updates.
2. System sends email notifications for status changes.
test_cases: Given a customer, When their request status changes, Then they should receive a notification.

title: Save incomplete applications as drafts
description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later without losing data.
attributes_and_rules: Save and resume functionality; secure document storage.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User can save forms as drafts.
2. System securely stores uploaded documents.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they save a draft, Then the application should resume without data loss.

title: Integrate self-service portal with core banking system
description: As a developer, I want the self-service portal to integrate with core banking systems, so that data is exchanged in real-time for seamless transactions.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time data exchange; Error handling mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal syncs with core systems in real-time.
2. System handles errors gracefully.
test_cases: Given a transaction request, When processed through the portal, Then it should sync with core systems in real-time.

title: Optimize portal database performance
description: As a system architect, I want a scalable database architecture, so that the portal performs reliably during peak usage.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Database handles peak loads efficiently.
2. System maintains high availability.
test_cases: Given peak loads, When users access the portal, Then it should perform reliably and efficiently.

title: Maintain user interaction history
description: As a compliance officer, I want to maintain and access detailed interaction logs, so that the bank meets compliance and internal review requirements.
acceptance_criteria:
1. System logs all user interactions.
2. Logs are easily retrievable for compliance.
test_cases: Given a user action, When logged, Then the interaction history should update appropriately.
